subject: 1948 Arab-Israeli War
object: 15 May 1948 - 10 March 1949 | (9 months, 3 weeks and 2 days)

subject: 1948 Arab-Israeli War
object: Former British Mandate of Palestine, Sinai Peninsula, southern Lebanon

subject: 1948 Arab-Israeli War
object: Israeli victory | Jordanian partial victory | Palestinian Arab defeat | Egyptian defeat | Arab League strategic failure | 1949 Armistice Agreements

subject: 1948 Arab-Israeli War
object: Israel keeps the area allotted to it by the Partition Plan and captures ≈60% of the area allotted to Arab state; Jordanian rule of the West Bank, Egyptian occupation of the Gaza Strip

subject: 1948 Arab-Israeli War
object: Raising the Ink Flag at Umm Rashrash (Eilat).jpg | Captain Avraham 'Bren' Adan raising the Ink Flag at Umm Rashrash (a site now in Eilat), marking the end of the war

subject: Casualties and losses
object: 6,373 killed (about 4,000 fighters and 2,400 civilians) | Arab armies | 3,700-7,000 killed | Palestinian Arabs | 3,000-13,000 killed (both fighters and civilians)
